details: This course introduces the fundamentals of C programming language. Learn the basics of variables, control structures, and functions in C.
Explore the world of algorithms and algorithmic problem-solving. This course covers sorting, searching, and algorithm analysis.
Get started with C++ programming specifically tailored for data structures and algorithms. Learn C++ syntax and STL usage.
Learn essential data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues. Understand their implementation and usage.
Discover object-oriented programming principles using Python. Master classes, objects, inheritance, and encapsulation.
Delve into software engineering practices, including requirements engineering, design patterns, and software development methodologies.
Explore Amazon Web Services (AWS) and the world of cloud computing. Learn to deploy and manage cloud resources.
Gain expertise in MySQL, a popular relational database management system. Learn database design, queries, and administration.
Enhance your problem-solving skills with this course. Practice algorithms, data structures, and coding challenges to become a better programmer.
